name: Zombie Elves
description:
This is my first ever Game Jam! 

I think this Christmas-themed game turned out pretty alright.

Play as Peppermint as she travels through Santa's Toy Factory to try and find Santa and escape. Little does she know that he and Carol (Mrs. Clause) are the ones who turned all the elves into Zombies!

Unfortunately, I didn't have time to add the story in the game. I hope to someday be able to, though. (I included a DNF page on the title screen to show how much I didn't get done).
